text:
Hey all,

Great to see everyone sharing some cool work in here! I'm sharing an Autonomous Inbox and CRM Assistant app that leverages generative AI to intelligently manage your sales inbox and HubSpot CRM, auto-draft replies using your sales playbook & company branding, and integrates with Gmail and HubSpot. It is source available, runs on Pipedream and integrates via a custom HubSpot app. <https://github.com/jacob-dietle/Autonomous-Sales-Inbox-and-CRM-Assistant|You can check out it and clone a version of it here>. Any feedback is appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
